sentence.Network_en: He is a very refractory child .
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个很倔强的孩子。

sentence.Network_en: Silicate minerals are characteristically refractory and difficult to break down.
sentence.Network_cn: 硅酸盐矿物的特点是耐熔和难以分离.

sentence.Network_en: The excreta of aquatic animals - fish, frogs, turtles, snakes, etc - contain similar refractory materials.
sentence.Network_cn: 水生动植物如鱼 、 蛙 、 龟 、 蛇等的排泄物中也会含有类似的难处理的物质.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: alteration of obsolete refractary, from Latin refractarius 'stubborn' (see also refract)

entry.tran: 不服管束的；难以控制的
entry.def: Refractory people are difficult to deal with or control, for example because they are unwilling to obey orders.

example.ex: ...refractory priests who refused to side with the king.
example.tran: 拒绝支持国王的桀骜不驯的牧师
